Key Match Events: Otto López was a triple shy of the cycle
Connor Norby homered and drove in three runs
Xavier Edwards and Nick Fortes had two hits each
Phillies starter Aaron Nola (12-7) was lifted after he allowed five runs and nine hits over 4 2/3 innings
Pre-Game Insights: The Marlins were busy Saturday, adding four new players to the roster
Infielder Javier Sanoja made his major league debut with a pinch hit appearance in the seventh
Post-Match Reflections: Phillies manager Rob Thomson said catcher J.T. Realmuto has some swelling but will remain with the club as he recovers from a left knee contusion sustained Friday
Marlins manager Skip Schumaker said (Friday) was not great. Today was a lot better
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Marlins padded their lead with a three-run seventh against former starter Taijuan Walker
Philadelphia’s Kyle Schwarber hit a tying sacrifice fly in the third inning for his 93rd RBI of the season
Others: The Marlins placed RHP Max Meyer (right shoulder bursitis) and RHP Calvin Faucher (right shoulder impingement) on the 15-day injured list and OF Derek Hill (right shoulder impingement) on the 10-day injured list
LHP Andrew Nardi (left elbow muscle) was transferred to the 60-day injured list
